for _ in range(input()):
    ins = raw_input().strip()
    stck = []
    res = "YES"
    for x in ins:
        if x == "(":
            stck.append(x)
        else:
            if len(stck)>0:
                stck.pop()
            else:
                res = "NO"
                break
    if len(stck) > 0: res = "NO" 
    print res
